attributes.action: Erect a statue of Claudio Ranieri in Leicester.
attributes.background: This man provided the country with a great sporting fairytale. The owners have sacked him, let's do the British thing and show our thanks for his service to the English Premier League

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding whether to put up statues in Leicester.

You could make this suggestion to Leicester City Council:

https://www.leicester.gov.uk/
